Package com.redhat.rhn.frontend.servlets

Interface Summary
PxtSessionDelegate PxtSessionDelegate provides an API with operations for retrieving, creating, and updating the pxt session and pxt cookie.
 

Class Summary
AuthFilter AuthFilter - a servlet filter to ensure authenticated user info is put at request scope properly
CreateRedirectURI A CreateRedirectURI is a functor object that returns a redirect URI for a given HttpServletRequest object.
DumpFilter DumpFilter dumps the current request and response to the log file.
EnvironmentFilter EnvironmentFilter
HelpDocServlet HelpDocServlet is a basic servlet that takes a request URI for documentation and redirects it to the appropriate URI defined in the rhn.conf for that document.
IsoServlet Servlet which streams ISO files.
LocalizedEnvironmentFilter Filter for centralizing locale and charset detection and processing per-request
OvalServlet Servlet interface for downloading OVAL files
PxtCookieManager A PxtCookieManager creates, retrieves, and parses pxt cookies.
PxtSessionDelegateFactory PxtSessionDelegateFactory is a factory class for creating PxtSessionDelegate objects.
PxtSessionDelegateImpl PxtSessionDelegateImpl is an implementation of PxtSessionDelegate that wraps a RequestContext object.
ResourceReloadServlet A basic servlet class that reloads resources.
RhnHttpServletRequest RhnHttpServletRequest
RhnHttpServletResponse RhnHttpServletResponse
SessionFilter SessionFilter is a simple servlet filter to handle cleaning up the Hibernate Session after each request.
SetCharacterEncodingFilter Example filter that sets the character encoding to be used in parsing the incoming request, either unconditionally or only if the client did not specify a character encoding.
